report_title: KJET Baringo County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Registered >3 yrs, Cooperative Union, strong governance.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active contracts/RTGS from Brookside, Devyani, Ravine Dairies; multi-channel sales.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem–solution (re-tooling, bulk storage), detailed plan, quantified targets.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (Union/Aggregation/Processing), strong linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High women/youth board participation, 2+ green practices (Afforestation, Biogas).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover 5–<10M (KES 9.2M), stable/growing trend, solid bank statement.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent monthly orders, B2B focus, growing channels.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem–solution (Kiln, storage), detailed plan, quantified targets, co-investment readiness.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Additional VC (Forestry), critical node (processing/value addition), documented linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High youth participation (90% youth), 2+ green practices (reforestation, solar dryer).

applications.reason: Financial evidence (Audit Report/BS) provided is for 2010-2019, which is outside the required 'last 12 months' for verifiable financial evidence.
The provided Bank Statement document is corrupted/unreadable (image-based or corrupted - no extractable text found), failing to provide verifiable financial evidence.
The primary value chain is Poultry/Livestock (Farming), which is not one of the KJET Priority or Additional value chains.
